meanings.definition: The hymenia of the mushroom release spores.
meanings.sent1: The hymenia on the mushroom help spread spores.
meanings.sent2: I observed the hymenia on the mushroom releasing tiny spores.
meanings.sent3: The hymenia on the mushroom were like little spore launchers.
meanings.sent4: The hymenia functioned as spore distributors on the mushroom.
meanings.sent5: Each hymenium on the mushroom was a spore-dispersing hub.

meanings.definition: The hymenia of the flower contain reproductive structures.
meanings.sent1: The hymenia in the flower hold important reproductive parts.
meanings.sent2: The colorful petals hid the hymenia containing reproductive structures.
meanings.sent3: The bees were fascinated by the flower's hymenia full of reproductive bits.
meanings.sent4: The hymenia were like treasure chests of reproductive elements in the flower.
meanings.sent5: Each hymenium in the flower safeguarded vital reproductive components.

meanings.definition: The hymenia of the fungus are responsible for producing spores.
meanings.sent1: The hymenia of the fungus create spores for reproduction.
meanings.sent2: I learned that the hymenia of the fungus play a key role in spore production.
meanings.sent3: The fungus's hymenia were like little factories churning out spores.
meanings.sent4: The hymenia functioned as spore generators in the fungus.
meanings.sent5: Each hymenium in the fungus was a spore-producing powerhouse.
